Author: Goladus
Content:
Collaboration means sharing ideas, motivating each other, enhancing each others' strengths and compensating for weaknesses.

More than once have I been stumped on a problem, only to run it by a friend and have it solved in 30 seconds. Nothing about the nature of hacking demands that it be exclusively solitary, or exclusively collaborative. There are advantages and disadvantages to each.

Furthermore, an event where you shoot to get an entire project done in a day is a good excercise and a good learning experience.

Author: dfranke
Content: The technology for that is already there with S3 if you take full advantage of ACLs.  It would just be a matter of agreeing on a standard for shared access.

Author: jsnx
Content: Why can't we just have an internet FS? Compile all the apps down to a few common byte code formats and allow for namespace control via chrooting and similar mechanisms. No more web browser! We'd need to make symlinks more powerful, to enable opening a connection -- but there'd be little in the way of special UI required.

Author: portLAN
Content:
"How to Change the World", apparently by reading about Craigslist job ads, Facebook postcards, "celeb heads", and how to get an autographed copy of his book.

Getting a job on CL is the complete opposite of what start-up founders want to do, and there's no content on that blog for hackers.

Author: jsnx
Content: An operating system is a lot of things -- it would be more precise to talk about a "web userland".

Author: rms
Content: I had one teacher in public school, in fifth grade, who insisted you didn't need to ask permission to go to the bathroom. I didn't get that much freedom again until I got to college.

Author: dottertrotter
Content: Yeah, I thought of that. However, I wanted to come up with a solution that never involved them giving me their y combinator password.

Author: far33d
Content:
A good cover letter - written from scratch specifically for the job you are applying for - is the best way to get a foot in the door, especially with craigslist ads, where there might be 200 applicants with similar resumes.

It shows initiative, creativity, and a desire for that SPECIFIC job. \n

Author: aston
Content: If users trust you with their passwords, you can use the HTTP Identity API provided by news.yc. That is submit a POST directly to the login page (y?u=username&p=password, but POSTed). If "Bad login." is in the resulting page, that's not them.

Author: petercooper
Content: Ah, I just realized this probably won't work for you. I don't now for sure, but Jamaica probably isn't a "treaty" country, which E visas demand applicants have citizenship of.
